page.title: 09DINNERS AT BASLOW SCHOOL
page.content:
There are 99 pupils at St. Anne's School. 7 go home for lunch, 12 have packed lunches and 80 are served with dinners cooked on the premises. Chips are very popular and choc-ices are a treat. Here is a list of one week's menus.
Monday : Chicken curry, rice, roast potatoes,carrots. Jam doughnut and cream. Tuesday : Cheese & egg salad, crisps. Steamed jam sponge, custard. Wednesday: Sausage rolls, chips, baked beans. Jelly mousse, cream. Thursday : Braised steak, Yorkshire pudding, potatoes, carrots. Fresh fruit. Friday : Fish fingers, chips peas. Lemon meringue pie.
